alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 01 at 1:17PM PST until March 06 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 feet above 2000 feet and 4 to 18 inches above 1000 feet possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County and Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County. * WHEN...From late Friday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible with road closures possible. Blowing snow will cause white- out conditions at times. Downed trees and tree limbs with power outages are possible due to heavy snow and gusty winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels 1000 to 2000 feet. Heaviest snow above 2000 to 3000 feet Saturday morning through Sunday afternoon.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
